articles.author: Michelle L. Price, Rob Gillies
articles.title: Trump threatens Canada with a 100% tariff over its China trade deal and escalates feud with Carney - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump is threatening to impose a 100% tariff on goods imported from Canada if America’s northern neighbor goes ahead with its trade deal with China. Trump is intensifying a feud with Prime Minister Mark Carney, who's become a rising voice in …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump on Saturday threatened to impose a 100% tariff on goods imported from Canada if Americas northern neighbor went ahead with its China trade deal, intensifying a … [+5959 chars]
